sentences.sentence: But Marcion seems to have really put the scare of bejesus into the Roman church.
sentences.translation: 但马吉安似乎真的吓坏了，罗马教会。

sentences.sentence: But at the same time they learned their way around the machinery of elections and how to scare the bejesus out of any candidate they did not like.
sentences.translation: 但同时，他们也学到了以自己的方式对待选举机构和如何让那些他们不喜欢的候选人下课。
